name: SophosIntelix_GetReport
author: SOL
description: Get the latest info from Sophos Labs for a filehash or domain

configurationItems.name: clientID
configurationItems.description: Client ID for Sophos Labs Intelix

configurationItems.name: clientSecret
configurationItems.description: Client Secret for Sophos Labs Intelix

configurationItems.name: polling_interval
configurationItems.description: Define time interval between two requests attempts for the report
